Ingredients.name: Vitamin C
Ingredients.description: Vitamin C is an essential vitamin used by your gums and natural microbes. It demonstrates a strong defense against bacteria associated with dental decay and gingivitis.

Sustainable.title: Sustainable Development
Sustainable.description: APU Dairy strives to operate in an environmentally friendly, socially responsible, and economically efficient manner. We support the livelihoods of herders, protect natural resources, and work to pass on a sustainable future to coming generations.
